"Horizontal Registry" widget
The "Horizontal Registry" widget
is a tool designed to display static information in the form of harmoniously arranged bars (tile representation).
Examples of a customized widget:
A widget can be added in the
edit mode of the visual
of the object type. When switching to the "Widgets" tab in the "Elements" panel, drag-and-drop the "Horizontal registry" widget from the "Lists and tables of objects" section to the working area of the profile.
The "Horizontal registry" widget can only be dragged into a "Row" container previously added to the profile from the "Groupings" tab of the "Elements" panel.
We recommend to place the widget in the "Attribute group" container, which is also available on the "Groupings" tab.
To manage the widget, click on the "Settings" button, that will open a modal window.
Parameters
The widget is configured according to the following parameters:
Setting
Purpose
Attribute with objects
Selecting an attribute of the "Child object " or "Object " type with the "multiple selection " option active.
Visual
Selecting a visual from the drop-down list or adding/editing a
visual of the instance
by clicking the three dots icon.
Number of default values
The number of profiles of the selected attribute with objects for the end user displayed by default. The maximum number of values is 15.
Display the "Show All" button
Display the "Show All" button in the type profile for the end user. The button is used to view the entire registry of objects.
Registry for displaying all objects
The field is available when the " Show all button " switch is active.
Selecting the
visual
of the registry.
Display method
The field is available when the Show all button is active.
Selecting the way all objects are displayed. Possible values:
• in this window;
• in a new tab;
• in the modal window.
Title
Input of the title of the widget to be configured. The maximum title length is 100 symbols.
Localization setting. When you click, a modal window opens, in which you enter the name of the subject area. Input is available in different languages.
Title style
Selecting the title formatting style from the drop-down list or create a new one by clicking the three dots icon.

The widget displays the values, selected in the attributes group " Fitness club information" (after saving the profile, this element of the profile will be hidden according to the specified visibility algorithm). As the number of displayed values by default is less than the number of selected values, you can move to the next group of values by pagination at the bottom part of the widget or by using the arrows, available when hovering the mouse cursor on the last elements.
To view the full object registry, you need to click on the "Show all" button in the bottom right corner of the widget. According to the widget settings, this registry will be opened in a new tab in the form of the visual specified in the settings.
